title: Lee is like the only fun champ in the game...
body: ...but I suck at him....and then I got lee in aram right next game :/...and then I dc'd

replies.body:
There is one champion that I particularly find rather amusing to play...

Guessed it yet?

{{champion:17}}!

I find Karma fun.
RITO PLS FIX THIS, SHE SHOULDN'T BE ENJOYABLE.

"Fun" is an opinion...

I found {{champion:64}}  fun, but I got bored of him. Now I find {{champion:61}}  and {{champion:112}}  fun...

Everyone finds different champions fun on different levels man
Only fun champ? Yeah sure he's really fun if you know how to play him but he isn't the only fun champ.
